column4: does someone know the default webdirectory for the ubuntu clutch package?
anyone know how to access this http://packages.ubuntu.com/hardy/clutch once installed and running?
im looking for how to get to its webgui that its supposed to setup it doesent tell me where its path is going to be setup relative to http://localhost
heh well im trying to access transmission via webgui so i installed the web gui package for transmission "clutch" and i have no idea how to find it.
type which clutch in a terminal
or do sudo apt-get update and then search with the word clutch
the package has installed just fine
big type type locate and then search with the word clutch
it would be as if i were to install phpmyadmin via repo's and didnt know that its path was http://localhost/phpmyadmin/
don't use clutch so no idea
use the menu, system admin synaptic pkg manager
ok well i've got the clutch package installed through synaptic just fine
